title: Lubalin's Fact magazine covers
content:
Can anyone tell me what typeface Herb Lubalin used for the FACT logotype?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123082953im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4_herb_lubalin_fact_3501.jpg)
  
Thanks!
author: shaaaark

comments.content: The contrast is so high it leads me to believe this is hand drawn and in the style of [Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123082953/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/genres/caslon/&sample_text=fact&sample_size=200). ITC Caslon 224 and Big Caslon are my best matches.
